description: This event type is triggered when a user requested to download a file from the DRS3 service that is not yet staged in the Outbox storage.

drs_id.description: The DRS ID which can be used to access the file for download.

file_id.description: The public ID of the file (as generated by the Metadata Repository service)

request_id.description: A unique identified for the original user request that let to this event.

timestamp.description: The time when the user request was received.

title: non_staged_file_requested
